lines.text: What is it with these clothes? It looks like the cast of Miami Vice crawled into your closet, and died.

[considering divorce papers]
This isn't about money. What do you want from me, must tell me what you want?
I come home late, what is that, a crime? I don't answer question while I'm reading the paper. Well I'm sorry, I can't talk and read at the same time! I'm not a ventriloquist.
Why didn't you tell me you were a man?
What, do you expect me to blurt it out all at once?
I have always been interested in soft drinks. They're unique, they are clean, you don't need a showroom, they repeat... They are an ideal product.
While we've gotten personal like this, I have a list of all the people that I've been intimate with over the past ten years. Can I ask to see you list the next time we meet?
Don't ruin this. These girls are open minded and convivial. Modern progressive women. Sluts. Don't get ethical, it inhibits their sexual creativity.
You're a very shallow person, do you know that?
What, having some woman make fried bread for you is deep?
Ah, damn it, I'm not happy. I want to get happy.

What are you making such a big deal about happiness for? Look at me. I trade all day against guys who would cut my heart out of an eighth. I drink too much, I eat rich food, I make love to women half my age. You think I'm happy?
That's the advantage of being shallow.
Something's bothering me? You watch every move that I make, and you haven't noticed that I'm going crazy? I can't breathe! You're constantly watching me, and questioning me, and examining me.
That's what you do when you care about someone.
No, that's what you do when you take a hostage.
